players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Charlie is the mafioso. I investigated them last night and confirmed it. We need to vote to arrest Charlie today."
Charlie: "Bob is lying to protect himself. If I were the mafioso, why would I leave a detective alive? He's making this up to divert attention from himself."
You: "Charlie, if you're not the mafioso, who do you think it is and why?"

Charlie: "Bob is trying to shift the blame onto me because he's nervous that I'll expose him as the real mafioso. Think about it, if Bob was truly the detective, why didn't the mafia target him last night?"

Bob: "Charlie is trying to confuse us all with misdirection. As the detective, I had no reason to lie about my investigation. The mafia might have left me alive hoping to create doubt, but the evidence is clear: Charlie is the mafioso."
You: "Bob, if you're the detective, why do you think the mafia didn't target you last night? Do you have any other evidence to support your claim besides your investigation?"
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
